metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18442 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
Infinite Loop in zziplib v0.13.69 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service via the return value "zzip_file_read" in the function"unzzip_cat_file".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18442` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3.2ubuntu1.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3.2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3.2ubuntu1.1').
